nodes.text: Vontor was a planet located in the Si'Klaata Cluster within the boundaries of Hutt Space. Vontor was a huge source of kiirium.

Before the founding of the Galactic Republic, three battles between the Hutts and the forces of Xim the Despot were fought here as part of the Xim Wars. The first two ended in stalemate. In the third, 25,100 BBY, the Hutts under Kossak surprised Xim with a horde of their newest allies—the Weequays, Vodrans, Nikto, and Klatooinians—and defeated Xim.
